IBM Edge 2016 Notes¶

These are notes from the IBM Edge 2016 conference.

There are probably errors and omissions here. I can only type so fast, and there are certain things that are more interesting to me than others.

I will only make notes here on the breakouts since most of the big keynote sessions are already recorded.
